txt.en: 'My father gave you the ledger? Let us head up the hill then and see what we can find.'
'You will have to make your stand here.'
'Where did they come from? I hope we do not meet any more. The homestead is just up the hill.'
Instance: Homestead Defence
'You are very powerful. I am glad that my dad sent you here. It is just a little further up the hill.'
'Thank you for helping me to defend our home.'

'I am glad I did not try to come here all by myself!'
'Dunland has never been this dangerous before!'
'We are almost to the top!'
Follow Mabon to the homestead

Talk to Mabon at Andras' homestead
Defend Andras' homestead
Andras is not the only one who wishes to obtain valuables from his homestead.
'The homestead is just up the hill here.'
'We must push on!'
'I hope that is the last of them. The homestead is just up the hill.'
'The Dragon-clan? Here? They will destroy the farm!'

The strange warrior says to Mabon:

'The Boar-clan remembers those who aid us, and we honour our friendships. Not long ago, your father helped us in a time of need. When you are in trouble Mabon, we will always be there for you.'

To you, he says:

'You are kind to aid this boy, duvodiad... kindness is a dying virtue in these lands.'
'Be careful! More are coming!'
